Class.name: Strix.SCM.Processor.RemoveEnsProd
Class.Description: Removes Ensemble Production classes from the export.

Method.name: Run
Method.Implementation:
Set Status = ..RemoveProductions(Directory) If 'Status Quit Status
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveProductions
Method.Description: Checks all export files in a directory, and removes any file containing an Ensemble production.
